name: Shark Aviation
about: Shark Aviation, based at Blue Grass Airport in Lexington, Kentucky, specializes in seaplane tours and training. Using a Cessna 185 on amphibious floats, we offer private and commercial seaplane ratings. Our operations are primarily conducted at Lake Cumberland and the Ohio River, providing a unique flying experience. We can accommodate up to three passengers per flight for our 20-minute seaplane tours. With a focus on safety and comprehensive training, Shark Aviation is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their seaplane certifications. Whether you're interested in recreational flying or a professional career, Shark Aviation is your premier choice for seaplane training and tours.
